posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

3/13/23- 3/19/23
Issue - V143
Current Release: 1.20.0

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps
  • = components

Updates

  • Come join us! The Streamlit data science team is hiring a new manager.
  • Check out our new TikTok channel.
  • #30DaysofStreamlit is now available in Chinese.
  • Streamlit officially has over 100k developers! Thanks for being such an awesome community.

Featured Content

  • Streamlit App Showcase | Tips for making your app stand out! @andfanilo
  • Streamlit color theme editor @whitphx
  • LaTeX Longtable Generator

Tutorials/Introduction

  • How to Build a CHAT BOT with ChatGPT API (GPT-3.5-TURBO) having CONVERSATIONAL MEMORY in Python @avratanubiswas
  • How to build a Chatbot with ChatGPT API and a Conversational Memory in Python @avratanubiswas
  • How I used ChatGPT to Build a Streamlit Dashboard App
  • Deploy a Machine Learning Model using Streamlit Library Explain in Detail
  • تطبيق عملي: مبادئ تصميم واجهات وتطبيقات علم البيانات | Streamlit Basics (Dashboards & Data Apps)

  • Streamlit app - analyse de factures
  • Celebrity Similarity webapp -Deep learning tutorial - Pytorch and Streamlit
  • Editable Snowflake Tables in Streamlit (a Demo)
  • Build a Stocks Price Prediction App powered by Snowflake, AWS, Python and Streamlit — Part 1
  • Build a Stocks Price Prediction App powered by Snowflake, AWS, Python and Streamlit — Part 2
  • Build a Stocks Price Prediction App powered by Snowflake, AWS, Python and Streamlit — Part 3
  • Making the Right Call: A Data Engineer’s Guide to Switching Tools
  • OpenAI + Streamlit: Creating an AI Copywriter
  • Building an Interactive Exploratory Data Analysis App with Python and Streamlit: A step-by-step tutorial with Data Profiling API
  • Streamlit: Revolutionizing Data Science Web Applications with Python
  • Creating a minimal portfolio using streamlit
  • ChatGPT APIとStreamlitを使って超簡単にAIアプリを作ってみた
  • 2023/03/16 読んだ記事まとめ(Streamlit で Snowflake のデータを編集, Looker+Streamlit)

  • PostgreSQLとFastAPIとStreamlitを使ってTodoリストを作ろう（前編）

NLP and Language
